explains: n. 残疾，缺陷；无能力，障碍；残疾补贴
wordGroup: learning disability 学习障碍；智能障碍
physical disability 残疾；肢体残疾；生理缺陷

sentences.en: We all fear disability or infirmity.
sentences.cn: 我们都害怕伤残或体弱。

sentences.en: Disability is a physical limitation on your life.
sentences.cn: 残疾在身体方面限制了你的生活。

sentences.en: He qualifies for help on the grounds of disability.
sentences.cn: 他因身有残疾有资格得到帮助。
